content: Regular, moderate-intensity exercise has immune-boosting benefits that may help your body fight off infections, including COVID-19.
Physical activity help copes with the psychological distress of isolation caused by COVID-19.
Exercise can help with common comorbidities associated with severe COVID-19 infections.
Exercise may be especially beneficial for older adults and people with chronic health conditions who are more likely to be infected by COVID-19.
physical inactivity can cause increased inflammation, which in the case of infections (such as COVID-19) can compound symptoms and impair immune responses.
